com.googlecode.aluminumproject.expressions
Interface ExpressionFactory

All Superinterfaces:
ConfigurationElement
All Known Implementing Classes:
ElExpressionFactory
public interface ExpressionFactory
extends ConfigurationElement

A factory for expressions. A configuration can contain more than one expression factory; each one is used to recognise and create expressions with a specific syntax (or expression language).

Method Summary
 Expression create(String value, Context context)
          Creates an expression from a textual value.

          Recognises expressions in a text.

Method Detail

findExpressions

List<ExpressionOccurrence> findExpressions(String text)
Recognises expressions in a text.

Parameters:
text - the text to find expressions in
Returns:
all occurrences of expressions in the given text

create

Expression create(String value,
                  Context context)
                  throws ExpressionException
Creates an expression from a textual value.

Parameters:
value - the expression value to parse
context - the context in which the expression will be evaluated
Returns:
the new expression
Throws:
ExpressionException - when the expression can't be created
